470540.name: Barony Extended Soundtrack by Chris Kukla
470540.description:
The complete soundtrack of Barony, composed by the talented Chris Kukla. This soundtrack contains over two hours of original in-game music in mp3 format. The track listing for this soundtrack is as follows:

  • Turning Wheel Splash 00:07
  • The Story So Far 02:30
  • Treasures Untold 04:43
  • Reflection 03:20
  • Hero's Lament 03:02
  • Twisting Passages 05:48
  • Miner's Legacy 06:28
  • Braving the Unknown 05:14
  • Sally Forth 05:13
  • Mines Combat 00:43
  • Minetown Theme 02:16
  • Shop Theme 02:03
  • Mired 05:20
  • Dripping Vines 05:32
  • Bushwhacking 04:43
  • Swamp Combat 00:45
  • Tricks and Traps 05:11
  • By the Hourglass 05:21
  • Slipping Sands 05:24
  • Labyrinth Combat 00:54
  • Bad Omens 01:13
  • The Minotaur Chase 01:19
  • The Blue Builders 05:21
  • Lost Kingdom 05:17
  • Ruins Combat 01:01
  • The Mystic Library 01:50
  • Crossing The Threshold 04:35
  • Crawling From Death 04:44
  • Underworld Combat 00:55
  • The Baron's Wrath 01:21
  • Deepest Depths 05:02
  • Faint Sparkling 04:49
  • Crystal Caves Combat 01:02
  • Automation 06:17
  • Buried Wonder 05:36
  • Mystic Citadel Combat 01:03
  • Duet of Death 01:36
  • Brooding Demons 05:52
  • Burning Wastes 04:52
  • Hell Combat 01:06
  • Baphomet's Theme 01:43
  • Last Breath 00:37
  • End Game 01:40
  • Atmosphere 01:40
